forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain this afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
